broadwick.graph

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.graph.Vertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhyloNode

    public class Vertex
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class represents a generic vertex (node) in a graph.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAttributeByName

        public final VertexAttribute getAttributeByName(String attributeName)
        Obtain an attribute of this vertex by the attributes name.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to be found.
        Returns:
        the attribute (or null if no attribute matches the name).

        Add an attribute to the vertex.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
